about_the_game:
Treachery in Beatdown City U.N. Trouble is the exciting prologue to the Brawling Action Tactics game Treachery in Beatdown City. In Treachery in Beatdown City, President Blake Orama was kidnapped during his speech at the U.N. This is your chance to play a fresh look at what led up to the speech.



Orama may be a bit stiff and pretty full of himself, but when it comes down to it he can throw down in the streets! In this prologue, play as Orama to explore the area around the U.N. and encounter/fight off a deluge of the WORST people, from obnoxious bicyclists to werewolf loving wannabe politicians.



FEATURES:
  • Use the power of the PRESIDENTIAL FIST to throw out fireballs, flying uppercuts, spinning kicks, and more!
  • Use a mix of real time and COMBO MENU based attacks to tackle your foes!
  • Build custom combos from a bunch of fun unique attacks to create strike combos, grapple combos, and strike and grapple-ombos!
  • Fight against class based enemies, each with their own unique attack styles, behavior patterns and looks!
  • Inflict Status Effects such as Stun, Burn and Bleed; but watch out, the enemies can do the same!
  • Nod your head to a timeless score by Inverse Phase, creator of such albums as Pretty Eight Machine and the Chipping of Isaac

content_descriptors.notes: Our game is a dark comedy, dealing with bad people who say racist things and then you fight them.

detailed_description:
Treachery in Beatdown City U.N. Trouble is the exciting prologue to the Brawling Action Tactics game Treachery in Beatdown City. In Treachery in Beatdown City, President Blake Orama was kidnapped during his speech at the U.N. This is your chance to play a fresh look at what led up to the speech.



Orama may be a bit stiff and pretty full of himself, but when it comes down to it he can throw down in the streets! In this prologue, play as Orama to explore the area around the U.N. and encounter/fight off a deluge of the WORST people, from obnoxious bicyclists to werewolf loving wannabe politicians.



FEATURES:
  • Use the power of the PRESIDENTIAL FIST to throw out fireballs, flying uppercuts, spinning kicks, and more!
  • Use a mix of real time and COMBO MENU based attacks to tackle your foes!
  • Build custom combos from a bunch of fun unique attacks to create strike combos, grapple combos, and strike and grapple-ombos!
  • Fight against class based enemies, each with their own unique attack styles, behavior patterns and looks!
  • Inflict Status Effects such as Stun, Burn and Bleed; but watch out, the enemies can do the same!
  • Nod your head to a timeless score by Inverse Phase, creator of such albums as Pretty Eight Machine and the Chipping of Isaac

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Latest Mac OS
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 1.8Ghz or equivalent
  • Graphics: 512MB GPU, OpenGL 3.0+ (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

movies.name: Treachery in Beatdown City U.N. Trouble

name: Treachery in Beatdown City U.N. Trouble

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 1.8Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB GPU, DirectX 9, Shader Model 2.0 (XNA 4.0 Reach Profile)
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Xinput devices supported

reviews:
““Treachery in Beatdown City” wants to have a conversation with us through play. It does so by giving us bursts of dialogue, action, humor and brutal realism.”
Los Angeles Times
short_description: Master the art of the Presidential Fist! Play as Blake Orama on his way to the UN. Meet terrible people and beat 'em up with STYLE! FREEZE TIME, build custom combos with fireballs, centrist uppercuts and roundhouse kicks in this quick prologue to Treachery in Beatdown City!
